mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, sum(profit) as profitSum, sum(amount) as amountSum from uc_profit_detail where TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_time) = 1 group by member_id
mapper.update: update uc_profit_detail set is_deduct = 1 where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select sum(profit) from uc_profit_detail where quant_id = #{quantId} and profit > 0
